about.subtitle: A passionate web developer who loves turning ideas into modern, functional and well-crafted projects. Creating, coding and improving — that’s what drives me.
about.description: And when I’m not coding, I’m an animator. I guide young people, create activities and bring memorable moments to life. Animation is about inspiring, teaching and supporting. It’s both a responsibility and a passion.

manga.title: Manga
manga.description: A universe I dive into every single time.

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: Creating, sharing, playing and imagining — animation is at the heart of my journey and my values.

voyage.title: Travel
voyage.description: Exploring new places, discovering cultures and broadening my perspective.

licence.title: Bachelor in Computer Science
licence.description: A demanding program that built my foundations in development and algorithms.

bafa.title: Youth Work Certification (BAFA)
bafa.description: A training that taught me how to supervise, teach and create meaningful educational experiences.

bac.title: High School Diploma
